/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image captures the essence of a sunny day in Beijing, with its blend of natural beauty and urban architecture.
